next_steps: Run `npm i razorpay` in project root to install the Razorpay SDK.
Add environment variables to your .env.local: RZP_KEY_ID, RZP_KEY_SECRET, NEXT_PUBLIC_RZP_KEY_ID (optional).
Apply the checkout snippet patch: replace the Stripe online flow in pages/checkout.tsx with the provided snippet in checkout.razorpay.patch.txt.
Test in Razorpay test mode (use test keys).
Ensure server has access to MongoDB and that Order model has paymentId and paymentStatus fields (the project appears to have them).
